ErrorCodeReference.description: Reference table of all structured error codes

AUTH_001.description: Missing Consumer Headers - Required Kong consumer headers are missing from the request

AUTH_002.description: Consumer Not Found - The specified consumer was not found or has no JWT credentials

AUTH_003.description: JWT Creation Failed - Failed to create JWT token due to an internal error

AUTH_004.description: Kong API Unavailable - The Kong gateway API is temporarily unavailable

AUTH_005.description: Circuit Breaker Open - Service is temporarily unavailable due to circuit breaker protection

AUTH_006.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Request rate limit has been exceeded

AUTH_007.description: Invalid Request Format - The request format is invalid or malformed

AUTH_008.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected internal server error occurred

AUTH_009.description: Anonymous Consumer - Anonymous consumers are not allowed to request tokens

AUTH_010.description: Token Expired - The provided JWT token has expired

AUTH_011.description: Invalid Token - The provided JWT token is invalid or malformed

AUTH_012.description: Missing Authorization - Authorization header with Bearer token is required
